response.answer_text: Because he knows him… Unlike any of Bernie’s Quora fans, Barack Obama has actually met Bernie Sanders. He knows him well. He knows him better than any of Bernie’s Bros ever will. And I don’t think he likes him personally. I don’t think A LOT of Democratic politicians like Bernie personally. Barney Frank has said that Bernie has a tendency to lecture even people who agree with him, and alienate even people who are ready to vote for his bills. There is something “holier than thou” about Bernie Sanders that rubs rank-and-file Democrats the wrong way, and NOT just “corporate” ones. But—of course—to Bernie’s fans, anyone who opposes Bernie does so solely and exclusively because they are Wall Street-owned sell-outs. In 2016, all the “Bernie Bros” were saying they weren’t sexist against Hillary because they liked Elizabeth Warren for President. Now she is actually running for President and the same people are saying “Never Warren.” To them, there is NO ONE in politics they like better than Bernie Sanders, and that cult of personality (especially one that has such a disdain for the Democratic Party) is scary to any Democratic politician who is not actively in love with Bernie Sanders.

Obama is owned by the oligarchs. Bernie Sanders stood for working people and Obama stands for the rich. Early in his administration, Obama had the money to either forgive mortgages and save black people from foreclosure or artificially jack up the stock market and help mostly white people who were making over 250000 a year. Obama chose to help the mostly white people who were rich and let working mostly black people fall into poverty. This was the final proof that the Democrats are for the rich and are against people who work for a living. This is why Bernie Sanders decided that he had to run for president and why the Democrats fixed the nomination for Hillary Clinton. Unless people do there own research they will believe the last source that they heard and that will always be the corrupt news outlets. Here is what the Democrats stand for.
